CustomField.description: The number of Records matched by a Matching Job Batch in the 1-100 range. A high number reduces the consumption of the asynchronous transaction platform limit. The default value is 25.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of Records matched by a Matching Job Batch in the 1-100 range. A high number reduces the consumption of the asynchronous transaction platform limit. The default value is 25.
CustomField.label: Records Per Matching Job Batch
